description: Mobile techniques mitigated by Antivirus/Antimalware, ATT&CK mitigation M1058 (v1.0)
name: Antivirus/Antimalware (M1058)

techniques.comment: Some mobile security products offer a loopback VPN used for inspecting traffic. This could proactively block traffic to websites that are known for phishing or appear to be conducting a phishing attack.
